location: Rudravari Merakha, Patha Kunavaram junction, Chintalapalli, Razole, Andhra Pradesh

hero.title: Welcome to the divine abode of Lord Vinayaka
hero.location: Rudravari Merakha, Patha Kunavaram junction, Chintalapalli, Razole, Andhra Pradesh
hero.desc: Shree Siddi Vinayaka Temple, established in 1980, is a  place of devotion located at Rudravari Meraka Patha, Kunavaram Junction. Dedicated to Lord Ganesha, the temple has been a center of faith and spirituality for devotees, fostering peace, devotion, and cultural traditions in the community.

about.title: About Sri Vinayaka
about.lead: Key aspects of Lord Ganesha (Vinayaka) presented as cards.

chavithi.title: Vinayaka Chavithi Celebrations
chavithi.lead: Festival schedule, pooja timings, and key rituals.
chavithi.venue_content: Shree Shiddhi Vinayaka Swamy Temple, Rudravari Merakha
chavithi.pooja_lead: The puja programs will be performed by the couple Intipalli Nookaraju and Sri Mati Gangabhavani.

performances.title: Stage Performances (Day-wise)
